entry.summary: Uefa’s new funding distribution model, announced yesterday, is a bit of a mixed bag for Celtic. entry.title: Still basking in the sun after beating the rangers
entry.summary: This international break Celtic will have 11 players on duty with their countries. entry.title: BOBBY LENNOX 10 ALBIAN AJETI 9
entry.summary: LISBON LION Bobby Lennox scored TEN goals in two games within two weeks in 1968. That’s one more strike than Albian Ajeti managed in TWO years at the Parkhead club.
